LETTER OF OFFER

De-suups (List Attached)

Dear All,

Congratulations on being selected for the De-suung Skilling Programme (DSP) – {{ doc.course_name }} at {{ doc.training_center }} under full Scholarship Soelra from His Majesty the King. The scholarship will also cover expenses for your accommodation as well as your monthly Stipend.


The De-suung Skilling Programme was initiated upon Royal Command as a mark of appreciation for the selfless services of De-suups in supporting the national effort to address and overcome the challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic.


As a De-suup receiving this Scholarship Soelra, you are expected to always uphold the De-suung Code of Honour and follow the additional rules and regulations of the Training Centre. You will be required to reside at the accommodation provided by DSP at (Accommodation location). The training programme will begin on {{doc.course_start_date }}. You must report on the morning of {{doc.reporting_date }}. For details on logistics and related matters, please refer to the checklist attached to this letter. However, kindly note that if you cancel/withdraw your candidature to the DSP after confirmation and issuance of this offer letter, you will not be eligible to apply for any DSP for one (1) year from the date of cancellation or withdrawal. If you cancel and withdraw from an ongoing DSP due to non-emergency reasons, you will not be eligible to apply for DSPs for two (2) years from the date of cancellation or withdrawal.


Congratulations once again and all the best. We are confident that you will make the best of this special opportunity to enhance your capabilities and skills and contribute to nation-building.


Best wishes from the De-suung Skilling Programme.

Trainees Requirement List

Clothing Guidelines
  • Set De-suung uniform (all formation sign)
  • Military boot
  • Gho/Kira and Kabney/Rachu and accessories
  • A pair of sneakers
  • A pair of formal shoes
  • Socks and stockings
  • Sports clothes
  • Pants and jackets
  • One/two casual tracksuits
  • Spectacles, contact lenses and solutions and other personal medicines, hygiene items and other essentials that may be required during the training period for your own personal comfort and medication
  • Sanitary items (Female)
  • Facemasks
Toiletries
  • Shampoo & conditioner
  • Soap
  • Toothpaste and toothbrush
  • Comb/brush
  • Nail clippers
  • Razor and shaving cream
  • Bathroom slippers
Study Items
  • Notebooks
  • Pens and pencils
Hostel Items
  • Laundry detergent
  • Bed sheets and pillowcases (single, 2 sets)
  • Towels
  • Blankets
  • Sewing kit
  • Extension cords (small pins)
  • Plates, mugs, cups and spoon
  • Bucket and jug
  • Shoe polish/brush
